answers.answer: You need to discuss the particulars about your eyes with your surgeon.Diabetes can cause tractional retinal detachments from scar tissue.  No preventative measure to prevent retinal detachments except for stopping activities which have direct trauma to the eyes or head, such as boxing, etc.Dr.O.
